alert.note: Alert for Knox (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Knox County through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Verdigre, or 24 miles east of O`neill, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Knox County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
